Service Providers

get_walker_service(walker_repo, source_path, allowed_ext=None)[source]

Factory function for creating WalkerService instances.

Parameters:

  • walker_repo (IWalkerRepo) – Repository implementation for file system access.

  • source_path (str) – Source directory path.

  • allowed_ext (list[str] | None) – Optional list of allowed file extensions.

Return type:

WalkerService

Returns:

Configured WalkerService instance.

Connectors

class PluginConnector(plugin_packages=None)[source]

Bases: object

Handles automatic discovery and loading of plugins from various sources.

Parameters:

plugin_packages (List[str])

plugin_packages

List of packages to search for plugins.

_discovered_plugins

Cache of discovered plugin classes.

_plugin_instances

Cache of instantiated plugins.

Parameters:

plugin_packages (List[str])

discover_plugins(search_paths=None)[source]

Discovers plugins in specified search paths.

Parameters:

search_paths (List[str]) – Optional list of paths to search.

Return type:

Dict[str, Type[BaseFilterPlugin]]

Returns:

Dictionary mapping plugin names to plugin classes.

Discovers plugins in a specific path.

Parameters:

search_path (str) – Path to search for plugins.

Return type:

Dict[str, Type[BaseFilterPlugin]]

Returns:

Dictionary of discovered plugins from this path.

Discovers plugins in a Python package.

Parameters:

package_name (str) – Name of the Python package to search.

Dict[str, Type[BaseFilterPlugin]]

Returns:

Dict[str, Type[BaseFilterPlugin]]

Dict[str, Type[BaseFilterPlugin]]
